content: *cats love sardines and you ll love this catnip-stuffed crochet creation lionbrand com * lion brand pattern # 80061ad skill level easy #860 vanna s choice 1 ball each of 2 colors linen dusty blue crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers scrap of black yarn dried catnip fiberfill stuffing special stitch decrease single_crochet decrease makes 1 can with lid and 3 sardines some construction required to finish
